about.hero.title: About us
about.hero.subtitle: ASJR is a collective of advocates, community members, and volunteers working to make the justice system more compassionate, accountable, and human.
about.hero.imageAlt1: A group of protesters holding signs for social justice reform
about.hero.imageAlt2: A man is holding a mic talking to a crowd about social justice
about.story.heading: Our story
about.story.description: See how ASJR began, and why our fight for fair justice continues.
about.story.videoAlt: Video about ASJR's story and mission
about.vision.heading: Our vision
about.vision.description: We are a community where all persons are represented within a social justice system that is just, fair and inclusive.
about.vision.imageAlt: A group of people are outside a building, holding a sign protesting for social justice
about.mission.heading: Our mission
about.mission.description: Our mission is to challenge systemic inequities and create pathways for fair, compassionate support throughout the legal process.
about.mission.imageAlt: A group of people gathered outside a building to watch a speaker discuss social justice
about.goals.heading: Our goals
about.goals.description: These are the values that shape how we think, act, and serve our community.
about.goals.education.title: Education
about.goals.education.description: To educate ourselves and our communities about social justice issues.
about.goals.communication.title: Communication
about.goals.communication.description: To communicate our views and engage in community discussions.
about.goals.advocacy.title: Advocacy
about.goals.advocacy.description: To be a voice of change.
about.goals.collaboration.title: Collaboration
about.goals.collaboration.description: To listen to, and collaborate with, stakeholders representing diverse viewpoints.
about.goals.accountability.title: Accountability
